fields.title: Dark Teleport Chance
fields.description: Modifies the chance that the entity will teleport if the entity is in darkness

fields.title: Light Teleport Chance
fields.description: Modifies the chance that the entity will teleport if the entity is in daylight

fields.title: Max Random Teleport Time
fields.description: Maximum amount of time in seconds between random teleports

fields.title: Min Random Teleport Time
fields.description: Minimum amount of time in seconds between random teleports

fields.title: Random Teleport Cube
fields.description: Entity will teleport to a random position within the area defined by this cube

fields.title: Random Teleports
fields.description: If true, the entity will teleport randomly

fields.title: Target Distance
fields.description: Maximum distance the entity will teleport when chasing a target

fields.title: Target Teleport Chance
fields.description: The chance that the entity will teleport between 0.0 and 1.0. 1.0 means 100%
